roleset.name: strike repeatedly
roleset.note: PUMMEL-V NOTES: Please try very hard to make the agent/instrument distinction. (from pummel.01-v)

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: Moreover, some investors think a recession or renewed airfare wars will pummel airline stocks in coming months.
example.arg: a recession or renewed airfare wars

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Then he clubbed him with the other paw, rolled him around, pummelled him with his back feet and finally threw him to the ground with full force.
